src: Animals are made of many cells. They eat things and digest them inside. Most animals can move.
mt: 動物由好多細胞組成 佢哋食嘢,消化嘢
ref: 動物係由好多細胞組成嘅。佢哋食嘢並喺體內消化。大多數動物都識郁。

src: Only animals have brains (though not even all animals do; jellyfish, for example, do not have brains).
mt: 只有動物有大腦 (雖然唔係所有動物都有大腦,例如水母都無大腦).
ref: 只有動物先至有大腦（但並唔係所有動物都有；譬如水母就冇大腦）。

src: Animals are found all over the earth. They dig in the ground, swim in the oceans, and fly in the sky.
mt: 動物喺地球上都有,佢哋挖埋地,游喺海洋,飛喺空中
ref: 地球上遍佈動物。佢哋喺地下挖窿，喺海中遨遊，喺天空翱翔。

src: A cell is the smallest structural and functional unit of a living (things) organism.
mt: 細胞係生物體中最小嘅結構同功能單位

src: Cell comes from the Latin word cella which means small room.
mt: 細胞來自拉丁語 Cella 意思係小房間
ref: 細胞(cell)呢個詞嚟自拉丁語cella，意思係小房間。

src: If you look at living things under a microscope, you will see that they are made of small squares or balls.

src: They looked like rooms. He was the first person to observe dead cells
mt: 佢係第一個觀察死細胞嘅人

src: Elements and compounds can move from one state to another and not change.
mt: 元素同化合物可以從一個狀態移動到另一個狀態

src: Nitrogen as a gas still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. The liquid state is denser but the molecules are still the same.
mt: 氣體仍然具有液態嘅特性 液態狀態更加密度 但分子仍然一樣

src: Water is another example. The compound water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom.
mt: 另外一個例子係水 化合物水由兩種原子同一個氧原子組成
ref: 水係另一個例子，由兩個氫原子同一個氧原子組成，屬於化合物。

src: It has the same molecular structure whether it is a gas, liquid, or solid.
mt: 佢嘅分子結構係一樣 無論係氣體,液體,或者固體
ref: 無論係氣體、液體定係固體，分子結構都一樣。

src: Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.
mt: 雖然佢嘅物理狀態可能會變化 但佢嘅化學狀態仍然係一樣
ref: 雖然佢嘅物理狀態可能會改變，但化學狀態保持不變。

src: Time is something that is all around us, and affects everything we do, yet is difficult to understand.

src: Time has been studied by religious, philosophical, and scientific scholars for thousands of years.

src: We experience time as a series of events passing from the future through the present to the past.

src: Time is also how we compare the duration (length) of events.

src: You can mark the passing of time yourself by observing the repetition of a cyclical event. A cyclical event is something that happens again and again regularly.

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 週期性事件係指一次又一次有規律噉發生嘅事情

src: Computers today are used to manipulate pictures and videos.

src: Sophisticated animations can be constructed on computers, and this kind of animation is increasingly being used in television and films.

src: Music is often recorded using sophisticated computers to process and mix sounds together.

src: For a long time during the nineteenth and twentieth centuries, it was believed the first inhabitants of New Zealand were the Maori people, who hunted giant birds called moas.

src: The theory then established the idea that the Maori people migrated from Polynesia in a Great Fleet and took New Zealand from the Moriori, establishing an agricultural society.

src: While listening to individuals share their individual, family, and organizational stories, we gained valuable insight into the past and some of the personalities who influenced for good or ill the culture of the organization.

ref: 喺聆聽大家分享自己嘅個人、家庭同機構故事嘅同時，我哋對過去以及一啲對機構文化有好或者有壞影響嘅人物性格獲得咗寶貴嘅見解。

src: While understanding one’s history does not assume understanding of culture, it does at least help people gain a sense of where they fall within the history of the organization.

src: In this instance, recalling previous instances of entrepreneurial behavior and resulting successes helped people to be open to new changes and new direction for the local church.

src: Such success stories lessened the fears of change, while creating positive inclinations toward change in the future.

src: Convergent thinking patterns are problem solving techniques that unite different ideas or fields to find a solution.

src: The focus of this mindset is speed, logic and accuracy, also identification of facts, reapplying existing techniques, gathering information.
mt: 呢個思維方式重點係速度,逻辑同精度 識別事實,重新應用現有技術

src: The most important factor of this mindset is: there is only one correct answer. You only think of two answers, namely right or wrong.
mt: 呢個思維方式最重要嘅因素係:只有一個正確嘅答案 你只會諗到兩個答案,

src: This type of thinking is associated with certain science or standard procedures.
mt: 呢個思維方式同科學或者標準嘅方法有關
ref: 呢種思維同某啲科學或者標準程序有關。

src: People with this type of thinking have logical thinking, are able to memorize patterns, solve problems and work on scientific tests.
mt: 擁有呢種思維嘅人有理性思維能力 能夠記住模式,解決問題 同埋做科學測試
ref: 有呢種思維嘅人擁有邏輯思維，能夠記住模式，解決問題同埋進行科學測試。

src: Humans are by far the most talented species in reading the minds of others.
mt: 人類係最有才華嘅物種 能夠讀懂他人嘅思想
ref: 到目前為止，人類係最有能力睇穿其他人諗法嘅物種。

src: That means we are able to successfully predict what other humans perceive, intend, believe, know or desire.
mt: 咁樣我哋可以成功預測其他人會感受到,有意想,相信,知道或者渴望嘅嘢
ref: 噉表示我哋可以成功噉預測其他人嘅感知、意圖、信仰、認知或者慾望。

src: Among these abilities, understanding the intention of others is crucial. It allows us to resolve possible ambiguities of physical actions.
mt: 其中一個好重要嘅技能係 了解他人嘅意圖
ref: 喺呢啲能力裡面，理解他人嘅意圖至為重要。佢令到我哋可以解決肢體動作可能存在嘅歧義。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 佢令到我哋可以解決肢體動作可能存在嘅歧義

src: For example, if you were to see someone breaking a car window, you would probably assume he was trying to steal a stranger’s car.
mt: 例如,如果你見到有人打破車窗 你可能會認為佢想偷陌生人嘅車
ref: 譬如，如果你睇到有人打爛車窗，你可能會假設佢想偷人哋部車。

src: He would need to be judged differently if he had lost his car keys and it was his own car that he was trying to break into.
mt: 如果佢失去咗車匙 佢想要入侵佢自己車
ref: 如果佢唔見咗車匙而想嘗試打爛車窗，噉就需要對佢作出唔同嘅判斷。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 噉就需要對佢作出唔同嘅判斷

src: MRI is based on a physics phenomenon called nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), which was discovered in the 1930s by Felix Bloch (working at Stanford University) and Edward Purcell (from Harvard University).
mt: MRI 係基于一個稱為核磁共振 (NMR) 的物理現象, 佢喺 1930 年代由 Felix Bloch (工作喺斯坦福大學) 和 Edward Purcell (從哈佛大學) 發現.
ref: 磁力共振係基於一種叫做核磁共振（NMR）嘅物理現象，呢個現象喺20世紀30年代由費利克斯·布洛赫（喺史丹福大學做嘢）同愛德華·珀塞爾（嚟自哈佛大學）發現。

src: In this resonance, magnetic field and radio waves cause atoms to give off tiny radio signals.
mt: 喺呢度嘅共振中 磁場同電波會導致原子發出微小嘅電波
ref: 喺呢種共振當中，磁場同無線電波令到原子發出微弱嘅無線電信號。

src: In the year 1970, Raymond Damadian, a medical doctor and research scientist, discovered the basis for using magnetic resonance imaging as a tool for medical diagnosis.
mt: 1970 年,一名醫師兼研究科學家 Raymond Damadian 發現咗磁共振成像嘅基礎
ref: 1970年，醫生兼研究科學家雷蒙德·達馬迪安發現將磁力共振成像作為醫學診斷工具嘅基礎。

src: Four years later a patent was granted, which was the world's first patent issued in the field of MRI.
mt: 四年後 發明咗專利 佢係世界上第一個喺磁力共振掃描領域發明嘅專利
ref: 四年後獲頒一項專利，呢個係世界上喺磁力共振領域頒發嘅第一項專利。

src: In 1977, Dr. Damadian completed the construction of the first “whole-body” MRI scanner, which he called the ”Indomitable”.
mt: 1977 年, Damadian 博士完成咗第一部全身 MRI 掃描器嘅建造,佢叫佢做 Indomitable
ref: 1977年，達馬迪安醫生造好咗第一部「全身」磁力共振掃描儀，佢稱之為「Indomitable」。

src: Asynchronous communication encourages time for reflection and reaction to others.
mt: 冇同步嘅溝通令人有時間反思同對待他人
ref: 非同步通訊提供反思同回應他人嘅時間。

src: It allows students the ability to work at their own pace and control the pace of instructional information.
mt: 學生可以以自己嘅速度工作 同埋控制教學資訊嘅速度
ref: 噉樣令學生能夠按照自己嘅節奏學習，並控制教學資訊嘅節奏。

src: In addition, there are fewer time restrictions with the possibility of flexible working hours. (Bremer, 1998)
mt: 另外,有少啲時間限制,有更柔軟嘅工作時間 (Bremer 1998)
ref: 除此之外，時間限制減少，有可能實行彈性工作時間。（布雷默，1998年）

src: The use of the Internet and the World Wide Web allows learners to have access to information at all times.
mt: 互聯網同世界網嘅使用 畀學生可以隨時得到資訊
ref: 使用互聯網同萬維網能夠令到學員隨時獲取資訊。

src: Students can also submit questions to instructors at any time of day and expect reasonably quick responses, rather than waiting until the next face-to-face meeting.
mt: 學生可以喺日中任何時間向教員提出問題 期待得到合理快速嘅答案
ref: 學生亦都可以喺全日任何時候向導師提交問題，並且可以預期得到幾快嘅回應，而唔係等到下次面授課堂。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 而唔係等到下次面授課堂

src: The postmodern approach to learning offers the freedom from absolutes. There is no one good way to learn.
mt: 后现代嘅學習方法提供咗無絕對嘅自由
ref: 後現代主義學習方式提供絕對自由。好嘅學習途徑唔只一種。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 好嘅學習途徑唔只一種

src: In fact, there is not one good thing to learn.Learning takes place in the experience between the learner and the knowledge presented.
mt: 事實上,學識唔好有一個好嘢
ref: 事實上，冇一件好事值得學習。學員與所展現知識嘅互動體驗就係學習嘅過程。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 學員與所展現知識嘅互動體驗就係學習嘅過程

src: Our current experience with all the do-it-yourself and information presenting, learning-based television shows illustrates this point.
mt: 我哋目前有所有做自己同資訊展示嘅 學習型電視節目嘅經驗 證明咗呢個點
ref: 我哋目前喺所有DIY、資訊呈現、以學習為本嘅電視節目方面嘅經驗就講明咗呢一點。

src: So many of us find ourselves watching a television show that informs us of a process or experience in which we will never participate or apply that knowledge.
mt: 我哋好多人都睇緊電視節目 畀我哋聽一個過程或者經歷 我哋永遠唔會參與或者應用呢啲知識
ref: 我哋當中好多人發現，自己喺度睇一個電視節目，個節目講畀我哋知呢一個係我哋永遠都唔會參與或者應用到呢啲知識嘅過程或者體驗。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 我哋永遠唔會參與或者應用呢啲知識

src: We will never overhaul a car, build a fountain in our backyard, travel to Peru to examine ancient ruins, or remodel our neighbour's house.
mt: 我哋永遠唔會修改車,喺我哋後院水,去秘魯去睇古老嘅遺跡,或者改造鄰居嘅房子
ref: 我哋永遠都唔會對部車大修，唔會喺後院起噴泉，亦唔會去秘魯遺跡考古，更唔會改造左鄰右里嘅屋。

src: Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access.
mt: 由于海底光纖線線同歐洲同寬頻衛星嘅連接,格陵蘭島有良好的連接, 93% 嘅人口有互聯網接入.
ref: 有賴連接歐洲嘅海底光纖電纜同寬頻衛星，格陵蘭島嘅網絡連接良好，93%嘅人都可以上網。

src: Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi.
mt: 你嘅酒店或者宿主 (如果你住喺客或者私人家) 可能會有無線或互聯網接觸嘅電腦, 所有嘅住宿都有互聯網咖啡廳或者有公共無線
ref: 你嘅酒店或者房東（如果住喺賓館或者私人住宅）可能會有wifi或者連接互聯網嘅酒電腦，所有定居點都有網吧，有啲地方就有公共wifi。

src: As mentioned above, though the word "Eskimo" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada.
mt: 正如上述,雖然美國仍然接受"埃斯基莫"嘅詞語 但喺美國以外嘅北極地區 很多人認為係侮辱性的 尤其喺加拿大
ref: 正如上面所提到嘅，雖然喺美國依然可以接受「愛斯基摩人」呢個詞，但好多非美國裔北極居民認為呢個係貶義詞，特別係喺加拿大。

src: While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners.
mt: 雖然你聽過格陵蘭原住民用嘅詞 但外國人應該避免用
ref: 雖然你可能會聽到格陵蘭原住民使用呢個詞，但係外國人應該避免使用。

src: The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland.
mt: 格陵蘭島嘅原住民稱自己係加拿大嘅伊努伊特人 而格陵蘭島嘅加拉阿爾克 (多元加拉阿爾利特)
ref: 格陵蘭島嘅土著居民喺加拿大叫自己做因紐特人，喺格陵蘭叫自己做Kalalleq（複數Kalallit，意思係格陵蘭人）。

src: Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no "rough areas."
mt: 格陵蘭島嘅犯罪同對外國人嘅惡意 基本上係唔清楚 甚至喺城市裡邊 都冇"粗野嘅區域".
ref: 喺格陵蘭，幾乎唔存在犯罪同敵視外國人。即使喺城鎮裡面，亦都冇所謂嘅「危險區域」。

src: Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face.
mt: 寒冷嘅天氣 可能係未準備嘅人面對嘅唯一真正嘅危險
ref: 寒冷嘅天氣或者係嗰啲毫無準備嘅人將會面臨嘅唯一真正危險。

src: If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing.
mt: 如果你喺寒冷嘅季節去格陵蘭島 (因為越北行越寒冷), 你必須帶著足夠嘅暖衣.
ref: 如果你喺寒冷嘅季節到訪格陵蘭（考慮到你越向北行，天氣就越凍），最緊要帶夠保暖嘅衫。

src: The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues.
mt: 夏天嘅日期好長 可以導致睡眠不足同健康問題
ref: 夏季漫長嘅白晝，會引起睡眠不足同相關嘅健康問題。

src: During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating.
mt: 夏天,你亦要留意北歐蚊子 雖然佢哋唔傳染病 但佢哋可以令你覺得尬
ref: 喺夏天，仲要留意北歐蚊。雖然佢哋唔會傳播任何疾病，但係佢哋會煩死人。

src: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified.
mt: 雖然舊金山嘅經濟係因為佢係世界級嘅旅遊景點而有關係 但佢嘅經濟係多元化
ref: 雖然三藩市嘅經濟同佢係一個世界級旅遊勝地有關，但當地嘅經濟係多元化嘅。

src: The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism.
mt: 最主要嘅就業領域係職業服務,政府,金融,貿易同旅遊
ref: 最大嘅就業部門係專業服務、政府、金融、貿易同旅遊業。

src: Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world.
mt: 經常喺音樂,電影,文學同流行文化中描繪嘅城市有助於令呢個城市同其地標成為全世界知名
ref: 佢喺音樂、電影、文學同流行文化中嘅寫照令到呢座城市同佢嘅地標聞名於世。

src: San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities.
mt: 舊金山已經有咗好多旅遊設施 擁有好多酒店,餐廳同頂級會議設施
ref: 三藩市開發咗一個大型旅遊基建設施，擁有眾多酒店、餐廳同一流嘅會議設施。

src: San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.
mt: 舊金山亦係美國其他亞洲料理最好嘅地方: 韓國,泰國,印度,日式
ref: 三藩市亦係全國食其他亞洲美食（韓國菜、泰國菜、印度菜、日本菜）嘅絕佳地方。

src: Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families.
mt: 旅行到沃尔特迪士尼世界 對好多美國家庭嚟講係一個重大嘅朝聖旅程
ref: 去迪士尼樂園旅行對好多美國家庭嚟講係一次重大嘅朝聖之旅。

src: The "typical" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home.
mt: 典型嘅訪問包括飛往奧蘭多國際機場 坐巴士去迪士尼酒店 經過一個星期唔離開迪士尼酒店
ref: 「典型」嘅遊覽方式包括飛去奧蘭多國際機場，搭車去迪士尼酒店，喺唔離開迪士尼酒店嘅情況下度過大約一個禮拜，然後返屋企。

src: There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of "going to Disney World".
mt: 有無限嘅變化可能發生 但大部分人講"去迪士尼世界"嘅時候 都係咁
ref: 雖然大家嘅遊玩方法唔同，但呢個係大多數人講緊「要去迪士尼世界」嗰時所表達嘅意思。

src: Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets.
mt: 通過 eBay 或者 Craigslist 等拍賣網站 賣嘅好多門票部分係多日嘅公園跳舞門票
ref: 好多透過eBay或Craigslist等拍賣網站喺網上出售嘅門票都係使用過部分日子嘅多日跨園通行門票。

src: While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable.
mt: 雖然呢個係非常常見嘅活動 但迪士尼禁止: 門票係不可轉換嘅
ref: 雖然噉樣做法非常普遍，但係迪士尼禁止噉做：門票唔可以轉讓。

src: Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month.
mt: 許可限於保護峡谷 而係開始嘅四個月前嘅月份
ref: 為咗保護峽谷，許可證係有限嘅，喺露營月份四個月當月嘅第1日可供預訂。

mt: 所以,五月份任何開始日期嘅後國許可證

src: Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations.
mt: ,最受歡迎嘅區域,例如 鬼牧場附近嘅 Bright Angel Campground, 通常由第一次日期收到嘅要求填充
ref: 最受歡迎嘅地區，譬如幽靈牧場附近嘅光明天使露營地，通常喺第一日開放預訂時就收到大量嘅預訂請求。

mt: 限量許可證係由第一人嚟,第一人服務

src: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes.
mt: 乘坐車去南非 係一個好好嘅方法 去睇到呢個地區嘅美麗 同埋去到唔同嘅旅遊路線
ref: 揸車進入南非係一種欣賞呢個地區美景嘅絕佳方式，同時又係前往一般旅遊路線以外嘅地方嘅絕佳方式。

src: This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4.
mt: 呢個可以喺正常嘅車用,有仔細規劃,但4x4非常建議,而且好多地方只有高輪4x4可以到達.
ref: 雖然喺仔細規劃之下，用普通車都可以做到，但係強烈建議用四驅車，好多地方只能夠用高軸距四驅車先可以到達。

src: Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are.
mt: 當你計劃時 記住 雖然南非穩定 但唔係所有鄰近國家都穩定
ref: 喺規劃時謹記，雖然南非穩定，但並非所有鄰國都係咁穩定嘅。

src: Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from.
mt: 簽證要求同費用係各國不同,而且會影響你嚟自哪個國家
ref: 簽證要求同簽證費因國家而異，並受到你嘅原籍國影響。

src: Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.
mt: 每個國家都有獨特嘅法律 要求車內需要有咩急需物品
ref: 每個國家都有獨特嘅法律要求車內一定要攜帶邊啲應急物品。

src: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana.
mt: 維多利亞布係津巴布韦西部一個城市 距离尚比亞嘅利文斯頓同博茨瓦納嘅邊界
ref: 維多利亞瀑布係津巴布韋西部嘅一座城鎮，同贊比亞利文斯頓接壤，靠近博茨瓦納。

src: The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay.
mt: 城鎮坐落喺布旁邊, 而布係主要嘅景點, 但呢個受歡迎嘅旅遊目的地,
ref: 呢個城鎮緊鄰瀑布主要景點，正正係呢個受歡迎嘅旅遊景點吸引咗大量探險者同觀光遊客，令佢哋願意逗留更長時間。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 吸引咗大量探險者同觀光遊客，令佢哋願意逗留更長時間。

src: In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic.
mt: 喺雨季 (十一月至三月) 水量會高 而布會更加劇烈
ref: 喺雨季（11月至3月），水量會增多，瀑布睇起嚟亦都會更壯觀。

src: You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls.
mt: 如果你穿過橋或者走喺布附近嘅道 你肯定會水
ref: 如果過橋或者沿住瀑布附近嘅小徑行，一定會淋濕。

src: On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!
mt: 另一方面,因為水量咁高 你睇到真正嘅布就被水遮住咗
ref: 另一方面，正正因為水量太高，你實際睇到嘅瀑布景象都會畀大量嘅水遮住！

src: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king.
mt: KV62 可能係谷內最著名嘅墓地, 霍華德卡特在 1922 年發現年輕王嘅幾乎完整的皇室埋葬.
ref: 圖坦卡門陵墓（KV62）。KV62可能係帝王谷中最出名嘅陵墓，1922年霍華德·卡特喺呢度發現咗呢位年輕國王近乎完好無損嘅皇家陵墓。

src: Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration.
mt: 但相比同其他王室墓地,土坦卡蒙嘅墓幾乎唔值得去去,因為佢比较小,而且裝飾有限.
ref: 不過，同大部分其他皇家陵墓相比，圖坦卡門嘅陵墓唔太值得參觀，規模太細，裝飾又有限。

src: Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible.
mt: 任何有興趣睇下 嘗試將木乃伊從棺材中拆除時 造成嘅傷害嘅證據 都會失望 因為只有頭部同肩部可以睇到
ref: 木乃伊嘗試出棺時造成損傷，所有想睇木乃伊受損嘅證據嘅人士都會好失望，皆因只可以睇到頭部同膊頭。

src: The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo.
mt: 墓地嘅神奇財富已經唔存在 但已經被移送到開羅嘅埃及博物館
ref: 呢座陵墓嘅大量陪葬品早已經不復存在，已經轉移到開羅嘅埃及博物館。

src: Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.
mt: 只有有限時間嘅訪客 最好去其他地方度過時間
ref: 建議時間有限嘅遊客去其他地方參觀。

src: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman.
mt: 姆克羅姆,西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西
ref: 格羅姆寺位於暹粒西南12公里。呢座山頂寺廟建於9世紀末，耶輸跋摩國王統治時期。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西西

src: The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile.
mt: 寺嘅黑暗氛圍同爾薩普湖景觀 令到登山值得
ref: 寺廟嘅陰森氣氛同洞里薩湖嘅景色令到爬山都值回票價。

src: A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake.
mt: 參觀呢個地方可以好方便咁組合到去湖泊乘船
ref: 參觀呢個景點可以順便搭船遊湖。

src: The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.
mt: 進入寺需要安哥爾通道 所以當前往東爾薩普時,請唔忘記帶護照
ref: 入廟需要吳哥通行證，所以去洞里薩嗰陣記得帶埋護照。

src: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital.
mt: 耶路撒冷係以色列嘅首都同最大嘅城市 雖然其他國家同聯合國都唔承認耶路撒冷係以色列嘅首都
ref: 耶路撒冷係以色列嘅首都同最大城市，但大多數其他國家同聯合國唔承認呢度係以色列首都。

src: The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years.
mt: 猶太山脈嘅古城有幾千年歷史
ref: 呢座坐落唙朱迪亞山上嘅古城有跨越幾千年嘅迷人歷史。

src: The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center.
mt: 城市係神教嘅三個宗教 - - 猶太教,基督教同伊斯蘭教 - 之聖地,亦係神,宗教同文化中心.
ref: 呢座城市是三大一神教——猶太教、基督教同伊斯蘭教——嘅聖地，而且係精神、宗教、文化中心。

src: Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel.
mt: 由于城市嘅宗教意義,尤其是舊城區嘅許多遺跡,耶路撒冷係以色列主要的旅遊目的地之一.
ref: 由於呢座城市嘅宗教意義，特別係老城地區嘅好多景點，耶路撒冷係以色列主要旅遊目的地之一。

src: Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.
mt: 耶路撒冷有好多歷史,考古,文化遺跡, 還有充滿人氣嘅商場,咖啡廳,餐廳
ref: 耶路撒冷有好多歷史、考古同文化遺址，仲有充滿活力、人山人海嘅購物中心、咖啡店同餐廳。

src: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points.
mt: 厄瓜多爾要求古巴公民喺國際機場或者邊境入境點入境之前 收到邀請書
ref: 厄瓜多爾要求古巴公民收到邀請函之後先可以通過國際機場或邊境入境點入境厄瓜多爾。

src: This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements.
mt: 呢封信必須由厄瓜多爾外交部合法化,
ref: 呢封函件一定要得到厄瓜多爾外交部法律認可，並符合某啲要求。

src: These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries.
mt: 哩啲要求旨在為兩國提供有組織嘅移民流程
ref: 呢啲要求係為咗規定兩國之間移民流動有序進行。

src: Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement.
mt: 美國綠卡持有人嘅古巴公民應該去厄瓜多爾領事館 獲得免除此要求
ref: 持有美國綠卡嘅古巴公民應前往厄瓜多爾領事館嚟獲得呢項要求嘅豁免。

src: Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.
mt: 你嘅護照必須喺你出國日期之後至少有6個月有效.
ref: 你嘅護照必須喺旅遊日期後至少6個月有效，亦需要一張往返/續程機票嚟證明你嘅逗留時間。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: ，亦需要一張往返/續程機票嚟證明你嘅逗留時間

src: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate.
mt: 遊覽對較大群體比較便宜 如果你獨自或者同一個朋友一齊 嘗試去認識其他人
ref: 報團人數越多，旅費越抵，所以如果你一個人或者淨係同一個朋友一齊，試下結識其他人，組成一個四人到六人嘅旅行團，噉樣人均價格更加抵。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: ，組成一個四人到六人嘅旅行團，噉樣人均價格更加抵。

src: However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars.
mt: 但係,呢個唔應該係你擔心嘅 因為往往觀光客會被混亂填車
ref: 不過，你真係唔應該擔心呢方面，皆因啲遊客經常畀人車住周圍去塞滿車先走。

src: It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.
mt: 其實,呢個方法好像係騙人相信佢哋要付得多
ref: 咁樣實際上更似係一種詐騙方式，等佢哋以為必須畀更多嘅錢。

src: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins.
mt: 塔塔喺馬丘比丘北端 落嘅山頂
ref: 馬丘比丘北端嘅雲端之處係呢座陡峭嘅山峰，經常係有關呢座遺跡嘅好多靚相嘅背景。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 嘅雲端之處係呢座陡峭嘅山峰，經常係有關呢座遺跡嘅好多靚相嘅背景。

src: It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes.
mt: 從下面睇起嚟睇起嚟有啲難 但喺最適當嘅人應該可以喺 45 分鐘內爬上
ref: 從下面睇有啲嚇人，而且路又斜又難爬，不過大多數身體健康嘅人應該可以喺大概45分鐘內爬完。

src: Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail.
mt: 路面大部分都係石頭階段 而條嘅鋼線係支手道
ref: 大部分路段沿路都鋪設咗石級。喺比較斜嘅路段，鋼絲索可作當做支撐嘅扶手。

src: That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly.
mt: 預計你會冇呼吸 而且要喺更嘅部分 特別係喺潮時 留意 因為會很快變得危險
ref: 亦即係話，要做好上氣唔接下氣嘅準備，喺更斜嘅地方要小心，尤其係濕滑路段，因為行得快可能會變得好危險。

src: There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.
mt: 靠近頂部有一座小洞穴 需要經過 很低而且非常緊緊
ref: 喺山頂附近有一個必須穿過去嘅小山窿，又矮又窄。

src: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835.
mt: 觀察加拉帕戈斯島嘅景點同野生動物 最好用船去去,就好似查爾斯·達爾文喺1835年咁
ref: 參觀加拉帕戈斯嘅景點同野生動物最好係坐船，就好似查爾斯·達爾文喺1835年所做嘅一樣。

src: Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers.
mt: 超過 60 艘巡航船 航行加拉帕戈斯海域
ref: 60幾艘遊船定期來回加拉帕戈斯水域，可以載8至100人不等。

src: Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season).
mt: 大多數人提前預訂定位 (因為高季度船通常都滿).
ref: 大多數人都提前訂好咗位（因為旺季嘅時候船通常都客滿）。

src: Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships.
mt: 確保你預訂嘅代理人係加拉帕戈斯島專家 熟悉各種船只
ref: 請確保幫你預訂嘅代理係熟悉各種船隻嘅加拉帕戈斯專家。

src: This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.
mt: 咁樣就可以確保你對你有特殊嘅興趣同/或限制 符合你最適合嘅船
ref: 噉樣可以確保你嘅特殊興趣或者限制同最適合佢哋嘅船隻相配。

src: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile.
mt: 喺 16 世紀西班牙人到來之前 智利北部係印加人統治之下 而原住民亞拉烏卡尼亞人 (馬普切人) 居住喺智利中部同南部
ref: 喺16世紀西班牙人嚟到之前，智利北部畀印加帝國統治，而土著阿勞砍人（馬普切人）就居住喺智利中部同南部。

src: The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence.
mt: 瑪普切族係最後一個獨立嘅美國原住民群體 智利獨立之後才完全融入西班牙語嘅統治
ref: 馬普切人亦都係最後一個獨立嘅美洲土著族群之一，直到智利獨立之後，佢哋先至完全融入西班牙語國家嘅統治。

src: Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.
mt: 雖然智利喺 1810 年宣布獨立 (喺拿破戰爭中,西班牙幾年冇中央政府), 但直到 1818 年才取得咗對西班牙人的決定性勝利.
ref: 雖然智利喺1810年宣佈獨立（拿破侖戰爭期間西班牙喺幾年之內都冇一個正常運作嘅中央政府），但直到1818年先取得對西班牙嘅決定性勝利。

src: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti
mt: 多米尼加共和國 (西班牙文: República Dominicana) 是加勒比海國家,佔領西班牙羅拉島嘅東半島,同海地共享
ref: 多明尼加共和國（西班牙語：República Dominica a）係一個加勒比國家，位於伊斯帕尼奧拉島嘅東半部，同海地接壤。

src: Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo.
mt: 除咗白沙海灘同山地景觀之外,美國最古老嘅歐洲城市亦都喺美國,
ref: 除咗白色沙灘同山地景觀，呢個國家仲係美洲最古老嘅歐洲城市所在地，而家係聖多明各嘅一部分。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 而家係聖多明各嘅一部分。

src: The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE.
mt: 島最初由泰諾斯同卡里比人居住.卡里比人係一個阿拉伯語話人,到來喺公元前約10,000年前.
ref: 泰諾人同加勒比人最先居住喺呢個島上。加勒比人講阿拉瓦克文，大概喺公元前10000年嚟到呢度。

src: Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors
mt: 歐洲探險家嚟到之後 幾年內,泰諾斯嘅人口 由西班牙征服者大幅減少
ref: 喺歐洲探險家嚟到之後嘅短短幾年內，泰諾人嘅人口因為西班牙嘅征服而大幅減少。

src: Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.
mt: 根據Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (印度戰爭) 寫作 1492 年至 1498 年之間 西班牙征服者殺咗大概 100,000 名泰諾人
ref: 根據巴托洛梅·德斯拉卡薩斯修道士 (《西印度群島條約》) 所講，喺1492年至1498年間，西班牙征服者殺死咗大約100000個泰諾人。

src: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building.
mt: 聯盟園.呢個空間係17世紀嘅修道院嘅大廳,其中聖地牙哥寺係唯一存活嘅建築物.
ref: 聯合花園。呢個地方係17世紀一個修道院嘅中庭，而聖地亞哥神廟就係唯一僅存嘅建築。

src: It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night.
mt: 佢宜家係中央廣場 而且日夜都會有好多嘢發生
ref: 佢而家已經成為中央廣場，無論日夜，呢度總係會進行好多活動。

src: There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo.
mt: 果園周圍有好多餐廳 午後同晚上 經常喺中央台度舉辦免費演唱會
ref: 花園周圍有好多餐廳，下晝同夜晚經常會喺中央涼亭舉辦免費音樂會。

src: Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend.
mt: Callejon del Beso (吻嘅街道) 兩個隔離只有 69 厘米嘅陽台 係一個老嘅愛情傳說之家
ref: Callejon del Beso（接吻小巷）。兩個陽台只係隔著69厘米，係一個舊時愛情傳說嘅地方。

src: For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.
mt: 換咗幾分錢 啲細路會話你個故事
ref: 只需幾個仙仔，一啲細孥就會同你講故事。

src: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more.
mt: 波文島係一個受歡迎嘅一日遊或週末遊覽 提供渡輪,徒步旅行,商店,餐廳等
ref: 寶雲島係一個好受歡迎嘅一日遊或者週末短途遊打卡地，有皮划艇、遠足、商店同餐廳等。

src: This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver.
mt: 呢度真實嘅社區喺溫哥華市郊嘅霍威海峡, 通過從溫哥華市中心嘅格蘭維爾島出發嘅水出租車,
ref: 呢個地道嘅社區位於溫哥華郊外附近嘅豪灣，從溫哥華市中心嘅格蘭佛島出發，搭定時出發嘅水上的士好容易去到。

src: For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential.
mt: 對於愛好戶外活動嘅人嚟講 爬上海到天空走廊係好重要嘅
ref: 對於嗰啲鍾意戶外活動嘅人嚟講，梗係要沿住海天走廊行山啦。

src: Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics.
mt: 惠斯勒 (距离温哥華開車1.5個鐘) 昂貴但因2010年冬季奧運而受歡迎
ref: 威斯勒（距離溫哥華個半鐘車程）物價昂貴，但因為2010年冬奧會而出名。

src: In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.
mt: 冬天,你可以享受北美最好嘅滑雪 暑假又可以嘗試真正嘅山上單車
ref: 喺冬天可以享受北美最好嘅滑雪體驗，喺夏天可以試下真正嘅山地單車。

src: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena.
mt: 許可證必須提前預訂 你必須有許可喺Sirena度過夜
ref: 一定要提前預訂許可證。你必須持有喺塞雷納過夜嘅許可證。

src: Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service.
mt: Sirena 係唯一一個提供宿舍住宿同熱餐嘅護衛站 除露營之外,La Leona,San Pedrillo,Los Patos 都只提供露營,冇提供食物服務.
ref: 塞雷納係唯一一個除咗露營之外仲提供宿舍住宿同熱餐嘅護林站。拉萊昂納、聖佩德羅同帕托斯淨係提供露營服務，唔提供餐飲服務。

src: It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards
mt: 公園許可證可以直接從 Puerto Jiménez 的 Ranger 站獲得, 但佢哋唔接受信用卡
ref: 可以直接從希門尼斯港嘅護林站獲得公園許可證，但佢哋唔收信用卡。

src: The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival.
mt: 公園服務 (MINAE) 預計抵達之前,唔需要超過一個月發出公園許可證.
ref: 公園管理局（MINAE）唔會喺預計抵達日期前超過一個月簽發公園許可證。

src: CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.
mt: 卡菲網El Sol提供預訂服務 費用為 30 美元,或者 10 美元,
ref: Cafenet El Sol提供預訂服務，收費 30 美元，或者提供一日通行證，收費 10 美元；詳情可以參見佢哋嘅科爾科瓦多網頁。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 詳情可以參見佢哋嘅科爾科瓦多網頁。

src: The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean.
mt: 科克群島係一個同新西蘭自由聯繫嘅島國家
ref: 庫克群島係一個同紐西蘭自由聯合嘅島國，位於南太平洋中部嘅波利尼西亞。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: ，位於南太平洋中部嘅波利尼西亞。

src: It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean.
mt: 佢係一個群島 擁有 15 個島
ref: 群島由15個島嶼組成，散落喺220萬平方公里嘅海洋上面。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 嶼組成，散落喺220萬平方公里嘅海洋上面。

src: With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as "Hawaii down under".
mt: 島同夏威夷一樣嘅時間區 有時被認為係"下面夏威夷"
ref: 由於同夏威夷嘅時區一樣，呢啲島嶼有時被認為係「南方夏威夷」。

src: Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development.
mt: 雖然小 但提醒老年人夏威夷之前 冇所有大型旅遊酒店同其他發展
ref: 雖然呢度比較細，但係令一啲年紀大嘅遊客諗起夏威夷喺成為一個州之前冇大型旅遊酒店同其他開發項目嘅情景。

src: The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki.
mt: 科克島島冇城市 但由15個唔同島組成.其中主要係拉羅東加同愛圖塔基.
ref: 雖然庫克群島冇任何城市，但係由15個唔同嘅島嶼組成。主要嘅島嶼有拉羅湯加同艾圖塔基。

src: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form.
mt: 喺發達國家 今日,提供豪華嘅床同早餐已經成為一種藝術品
ref: 喺今時今日嘅發達國家，提供豪華大床同早餐已經昇華成為一種藝術形式。

src: At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast.
mt: 果D酒店嘅最高級 當然主要係兩件事: 床包同早餐
ref: 喺高端市場，民宿好明顯主要喺兩個方面展開競爭：床上用品同早餐。

src: Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed.
mt: 所以,喺最好嘅呢啲店,你會發現最奢華嘅床單,
ref: 所以，喺呢類最精緻嘅場所，大家好容易搵到最豪華嘅床鋪，可能係手工製作嘅被或者古董床。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 可能係手工製作嘅被或者古董床。

src: Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish.
mt: 早餐可能包括當地季節性美味 或者主持人特別嘅菜
ref: 早餐可能包括當地嘅時令美食或者由主人烹調嘅特色菜。

src: The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.
mt: 建築物可能係一個有歷史悠久嘅舊建築物 有古董家具,有修飾嘅地形同游泳池
ref: 場景可能係一座歷史悠久嘅舊建築，配有古董傢俬、修剪整齊嘅草地同泳池。

src: Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity.
mt: 坐自己車去做漫長嘅公路旅行 簡單性係個吸引力
ref: 坐上自己嘅車，出發去長途自駕遊，箇中嘅簡單體驗有內在嘅吸引力。

src: Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations.
mt: 唔係大車 你可能已經熟悉駕駛車
ref: 唔似得大型車，你可能已經揸慣你架車，知道佢嘅局限性。

src: Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention.
mt: 建喺私人物業或者任何大小嘅城市嘅帳 可以引起不需要嘅注意
ref: 喺私人物業或任何規模嘅城鎮搭帳篷都好容易引起不必要嘅關注。

src: In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to "camp".
mt: 簡單嚟講,用你嘅車係好好嘅方法 去出國旅行 但唔常係去"露營"嘅方法
ref: 簡單嚟講，揸車係自駕遊嘅一種好方式，但佢本身好少係一種「露營」方式。

src: Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down.
mt: 如果你有大型小型車,SUV,塞丹或者站車,坐椅可以搭乘車
ref: 如果你有一架座椅可以攤平嘅大型迷你貨van、SUV、轎車或者旅行車，就可以去汽車露營。

src: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries.
mt: 有啲酒店有歷史 來自蒸汽鐵路同海洋航線嘅黃金時代
ref: 有啲酒店嘅歷史可以追溯到蒸汽鐵路同遠洋客輪黃金時代；即係19世紀或20世紀初第二次世界大戰之前。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: ；即係19世紀或20世紀初第二次世界大戰之前。

src: These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife.
mt: 呢啲酒店係當時嘅富人和名人住嘅地方
ref: 呢啲酒店係當時嘅有錢人同名人下榻嘅地方，經常有精緻嘅餐飲同夜生活。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: ，經常有精緻嘅餐飲同夜生活。

src: The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character.
mt: 舊式裝置,缺乏最新設備,以及有趣嘅老化
ref: 懷舊傢俬、冇最新嘅設施同埋某種優雅嘅古典味道亦都係佢哋特色嘅一部分。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 亦都係佢哋特色嘅一部分。

src: While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries.
mt: 雖然呢啲地方通常係私人嘅 但有時會俾國家元首同其他尊貴人嚟訪
ref: 雖然佢哋通常屬於私人擁有，但有時都會招待來訪嘅國家元首同其他政要。

src: A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.
mt: 旅行者有好多錢 可能會考慮一班環球飛機
ref: 如果一個旅客有一大堆錢，可能會考慮環球飛行，會喺當中好多嘅酒店住宿。

src: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit.
mt: 客房交流網絡係組織 聯繫旅客同佢哋要去嘅城市嘅當地人
ref: 好客嘅交流網絡係將旅客同佢哋要去嘅城市嘅本地人連繫起嚟嘅組織。

src: Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification.
mt: 加入呢個網絡通常只需要填寫網上表格
ref: 加入噉樣一個網絡通常只需要喺網上填寫一份表格；不過某啲網絡會提供或需要額外嘅驗證。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: ；不過某啲網絡會提供或需要額外嘅驗證。

src: A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers.
mt: 隨後,可用嘅主機列表會喺印刷版或者網路上提供,有時會由其他旅客提供參考和評價.
ref: 然後會以紙本或者網上形式提供一份可提供服務嘅主人名單，有時仲會提供其他旅客嘅推薦同評論。

src: Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay.
mt: Couchsurfing 成立於 2004 年 1 月 電腦程式員 Casey Fenton 搵到一架便宜嘅飛機去冰島 但無住宿
ref: 2004年1月，電腦程式員凱西·芬頓搵到一班飛往冰島嘅平價航班，但冇地方住，於是成立咗Couchsurfing。

src: He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.
mt: 佢寄電郵畀當地大學嘅學生 收到好多免費住宿嘅優惠
ref: 佢發電郵畀當地大學嘅學生，收到咗大量免費住宿嘅邀請。

src: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too.
mt: 宿舍主要為年輕人服務 典型客人已經二十歲了  但你通常會發現老年旅客也在那裡.
ref: 旅館主要面向年輕人——一般客人20幾歲——但你亦都可以經常喺嗰度搵到年紀大嘅旅客。

src: Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.
mt: 有細路嘅家庭係稀有嘅景象 但有啲宿舍可以畀佢哋入住私人房間
ref: 帶住小朋友嘅家庭好少見，但一啲旅館確實允許佢哋入住私人房間。

src: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics.
mt: 中國北京將成為 2022 年冬季奧運主辦城市,
ref: 中國北京即將成為2022年冬奧會嘅主辦城市，呢度將會成為第一個同時舉辦夏季奧運會同冬季奧運會嘅城市。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 呢度將會成為第一個同時舉辦夏季奧運會同冬季奧運會嘅城市。

src: Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events.
mt: 北京會舉辦開幕式,閉幕式 同埋室內冰場活動
ref: 北京將會舉辦開幕式、閉幕式同室內冰上項目。

src: Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.
mt: 其他滑雪活動會喺北京距离約 220 公里嘅張家科 (Zhangjiakou) 的泰齊滑雪場舉辦
ref: 其他滑雪項目將會喺張家口太子城滑雪場舉行，距離北京大約220公里（140英哩）。

src: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar.
mt: 大部分寺廟都有年節,從11月底開始到5月中旬, 依據每個寺廟年節日程有所不同.
ref: 大多數寺廟都有一年一度嘅節日，由11月下旬開始到5月中旬結束，視乎每個寺廟嘅年曆而有唔同。

src: Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple.
mt: 大部分寺廟節慶 都係寺廟周年慶,主持神嘅生日或者任何有關寺廟嘅重大事件的一部分
ref: 大多數寺廟嘅節日都係慶祝寺廟嘅週年紀念日、主神嘅生日或者同寺廟有關嘅其他重大事件嘅一部分。

src: Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.
mt: 喀拉拉嘅寺廟節係非常有趣嘅, 有經常嘅裝飾大象游行,寺廟樂團和其他節日.
ref: 喀拉拉邦嘅廟會非常有趣，有扮得靚靚嘅大象定期巡遊、寺廟樂團以及其他慶祝活動。

src: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences.
mt: 世界博覽會 (通常叫做世界博覽會,或者簡直叫做博覽會) 係一個大型國際藝術科學節.
ref: 世界博覽會（通常叫萬國博覽會，或簡稱世博會）係一個大型嘅國際藝術科學節。

src: Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history.
mt: 參與國家喺國家展廳舉辦藝術同教育展覽 展示世界議題或者國家文化同歷史
ref: 參展國家喺國家館舉辦藝術教育展覽，展示世界議題或本國文化、歷史。

src: International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants.
mt: 國際園藝展會係專門活動 展示花園,植物園同埋其他有關植物嘅活動
ref: 世界園藝博覽會係專門展示花卉展覽、植物園以及其他與植物有關展覽嘅活動。

src: Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not.
mt: 雖然理論上會係每年舉辦 (只要喺唔同國家舉辦), 但實際上係唔一樣
ref: 雖然理論上可以每年舉行一次（只要喺唔同嘅國家），但實際上唔得。

src: These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.
mt: 經常會喺三到六個月之間 舉辦呢啲活動
ref: 呢啲活動喺邊度都要通常持續三到六個月，舉辦地點面積唔少於50公頃。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: ，而舉辦地點面積唔少於50公頃。

src: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest.
mt: 多年來,已經用過好多唔同嘅影像格式.標準 35mm影像 (36×24mm負) 係最常見嘅.
ref: 多年嚟我哋用過好多唔同格式嘅菲林。標準35毫米菲林（36x24毫米負片）係最常見嘅。

src: It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR.
mt: 通常如果你耗尽就可以很容易補充 并且可以提供同目前DSLR相似的分辨率
ref: 如果用完，菲林通常相當容易補貨，並且解像度大致相當於而家嘅單反。

src: Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative.
mt: 有啲中型影像相機用6x6cm格式,更準確地用56x56mm負
ref: 有啲中片幅菲林相機使用6x6厘米嘅格式，準確啲講係56x56毫米負片。

src: This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).
mt: 呢個數據顯示 35 mm 負 (3136 mm2 與 864) 解析度幾乎是四倍
ref: 噉樣嘅解像度幾乎係35毫米負片嘅4倍（3136平方毫米對864平方毫米）。

src: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment.
mt: 野生動物係攝影師最具挑戰性嘅動機 佢需要好運,耐心,經驗同好裝備
ref: 捕捉野生動物係對攝影師最大嘅挑戰，當中唔少得運氣、耐性、經驗同良好嘅設備。

src: Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words.
mt: 野生動物攝影通常被當然接受 但好似一般攝影一樣 一幅相價值一千個字
ref: 野生動物攝影通常睇落簡單，但就好似一般嘅攝影一樣，一張相勝過千言萬語。

src: Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses.
mt: 野生動物攝影通常需要長遠鏡頭 雖然鳥群或者小生物需要其他鏡頭
ref: 野生動物攝影通常需要一個長焦鏡頭，不過好似一群雀鳥或一隻微細生物之類就需要其他鏡頭。

src: Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes.
mt: 好多異國動物好難搵到 公園有時有規則 禁止商業用攝影
ref: 好多奇異動物好難搵到，公園有時亦都出於商業目的訂立拍攝守則。

src: Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.
mt: 野生動物可能會害羞或者有侵略性.環境可能會冷,熱,或者其他方式係敵人嘅.
ref: 野生動物可能會怕羞或者有攻擊性。環境可能會好凍、好熱，或者其他惡劣情況都有。

src: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers.
mt: 世界上有超過五千種唔同語言 包括有超過二千種語言 有超過五千萬人講
ref: 世界上有5000幾種唔同嘅語言，其中20幾種使用者人數高達5000萬或以上。

src: Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly.
mt: 寫字通常比講話容易理解 尤其對講話嚟講
ref: 書面語通常比口語更容易理解。地址尤其係噉，佢哋通常好難清楚發音。

src: Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people.
mt: 好多國家都完全識英文 而且你仲可以期望少人知道英文 尤其喺年輕人
ref: 好多國家嘅人都識講流利嘅英文，而喺更多國家，佢哋嘅英文水平就有限，尤其係年輕人。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 你仲可以期望少人知道英文
喺更多國家，佢哋嘅英文水平就有限

src: Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto.
mt: 想像一下,一個曼古尼亞人,波士頓人,牙買加人同悉尼人 坐喺一張餐桌上 坐喺多倫多嘅餐廳食晚飯
ref: 你可以想像，一個曼庫尼人、波士頓人、牙買加人同悉尼人喺多倫多嘅一間餐廳圍住坐埋一枱食晚飯。

src: They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.
mt: 佢哋將佢哋嘅故鄉嘅故事 傳達到唔同嘅口音同當地語法
ref: 佢哋用獨特嘅口音同當地嘅黑話講家鄉故事，互相分享。

src: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food.
mt: 買嘢食喺超市通常係最便宜嘅方法 買嘢食
ref: 喺超市買嘢食通常係最抵嘅。如果冇機會煮嘢食，噉就只能揀現成食品。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 。如果冇機會煮嘢食，噉就只能揀現成食品。

src: Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food.
mt: 越來越多嘅超市 已經有多種準備好嘅食物 部分甚至提供微波烤箱或者其他方法供供食暖
ref: 越嚟越多超市提供種類更豐富嘅現成食品。有啲甚至提供微波爐或者其他方式嚟加熱食物。

src: In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.
mt: 喺某些國家或者商場有至少一個餐廳 經常係一個有價格實惠嘅非正式餐廳
ref: 喺一啲鄉村或者某類商店，場內至少有一間餐廳，通常係價格實惠嘅非正式餐廳。

src: Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you.
mt: 請將保險保險及保險公司聯絡方式複製
ref: 打印並隨身攜帶你嘅保單副本同保險公司嘅聯絡方式。

src: They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims.
mt: 佢哋需要顯示保險公司嘅電子郵件地址同國際電話號碼 提供諮詢/授權及提出索賠
ref: 保單上面需要顯示保險公司嘅電郵地址同國際電話號碼，以便獲得建議/授權同提出索償。

src: Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the "cloud").
mt: 隨時放入行李同網上 (附附上嘅電子郵件,或者存放喺"雲端"中)
ref: 喺你個行李箱同網上儲存另一個副本（通過電郵發送畀自己並附上附件，或者存喺「雲端」）。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 發送畀自己並附上附件

src: If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet).
mt: 如果你帶著筆記型電腦或者平板電腦旅行, 存放一張複製喺電腦嘅記憶體或磁盤上 (無需上網就可以使用).
ref: 如果帶手提電腦或者平板電腦旅遊，可以將副本存喺內存或者硬碟裡面（唔使上網就可以開到）。

src: Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help.
mt: 又畀出政策/聯絡人 聯絡人 同伴同家人同朋友
ref: 另外，應該將保單/聯絡方式嘅副本交畀旅伴同願意幫手嘅親友。

src: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat.
mt: (亦稱為鹿) 唔係本质上有侵略性,但如果發現威脅,會自衛.
ref: 駝鹿（又叫麋鹿）天生就唔具有攻擊性，但如果佢哋察覺到威脅，都會自衛。

src: When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.
mt: 當人唔認為大象可能危險嘅時候 佢哋可能會靠近大象
ref: 當人類唔認為駝鹿係潛在危險嘅時候，佢哋可能會靠得太近，將自己置於危險之中。

src: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important.
mt: 飲酒量適度.酒精影響人人都唔同,知道自己嘅限制非常重要.
ref: 適量飲酒。酒精對每個人嘅影響都唔一樣，了解自己嘅酒量非常重要。

src: Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol.
mt: 飲酒過度可能會造成長時間嘅健康狀況 包括肝臟損傷 甚至盲目甚至死亡
ref: 過量飲酒可能導致嘅長期健康問題包括肝臟損傷，甚至失明同死亡。如果飲咗非法生產嘅酒，就會增加潛在危險。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 。如果飲咗非法生產嘅酒，就會增加潛在危險。

src: Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.
mt: 非法酒精可以含有各種危險污染物 包括甲醇 即使係少量飲食
ref: 非法烈酒可能含有各種危險雜質，包括甲醇，就算係好小嘅劑量都會導致失明或者死亡。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 劑量都會導致失明或者死亡。

src: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower.
mt: 眼鏡喺外國可以比較便宜 尤其喺低收入國家 勞動成本比較低
ref: 眼鏡喺外國可能更平，尤其係喺人力成本比較低嘅低收入國家。

src: Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere.
mt: 請考慮喺屋企做眼科檢查 尤其當保險有保險
ref: 考慮喺國內做眼科檢查（尤其係喺保險保障範圍內），然後將處方帶到其他地方備案。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: ，然後將處方帶到其他地方備案。

src: High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.
mt: 啲高級品牌架 畀到呢啲地方 可能有兩個問題 有啲可能係破產品 而真正輸入嘅架可能比屋企更貴
ref: 呢啲地區嘅高端品牌鏡框可能有兩個問題；有啲可能係仿製品，同埋真正進口嘅可能比國內更貴。

src: Coffee is one of the world's most traded commodities, and you can probably find many types in your home region.
mt: 咖啡係世界上最有交易嘅商品之一 你可能喺你屋企有好多種類
ref: 咖啡係世界上最大宗嘅商品之一，喺你家鄉可能會搵到好多種咖啡。

src: Nevertheless, there are many distinctive ways of drinking coffee around the world that are worth experiencing.
mt: 但係全世界有好多唔同嘅飲用方式 值得你試試
ref: 就算係噉，世界各地依然有好多獨特嘅飲咖啡方式值得體驗。

src: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water.
mt: 溝 (或:溝) 係要去溝嘅底部,
ref: 溪降運動（或：峽谷漂流）係指進入峽谷底部，峽谷底部一係乾涸，一係充滿水流。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 峽谷底部一係乾涸，一係充滿水流。

src: Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).
mt: 道爬行組合泳,爬山同跳水嘅元素 但開始需要相對少嘅訓練或者體力形狀 (比如爬山,潛水或者登山).
ref: 峽谷運動結合咗游水、登山同跳躍嘅元素——不過開始嘅時候對訓練或者體型嘅要求相對較少（例如，同攀岩、水肺潛水或者高山滑雪相比）。

src: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails.
mt: 徒步行係一個戶外活動,其中包括喺自然環境度行走,通常喺徒步行道上.
ref: 遠足係一種戶外活動，包括喺大自然度散步，通常係喺徒步小徑上散步。

src: Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day.
mt: 日日徒步行涉及距离不到一英里 到可以在一天内行走的更长距离
ref: 一日遠足嘅距離可以從唔到一英哩到一日之內可以行完嘅更長距離不等。

src: For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them.
mt: 簡單嘅行程需要少少準備 任何適度健康嘅人都可以享受到
ref: 沿住一條簡單嘅小路遠足一日，幾乎唔使做太多準備，所有身體健康嘅人士都可以享受一日遠足。

src: Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.
mt: 家庭有細細路可能需要更多準備 但即使係嬰兒同幼兒 都可以輕鬆喺屋外度度度過一天
ref: 有小朋友嘅家庭可能需要準備多啲嘢，但就算有BB同學齡前兒童，都可以喺戶外輕鬆度過一日。

src: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently.
mt: 國際上,有近200個行程組織 大部分都獨立運作
ref: 喺國際上，有近200間跑步旅遊公司。其中大多數係獨立營運嘅。

src: The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents.
mt: 全球跑步旅遊嘅後代 Go Running Tours 網絡喺四個大洲嘅數十個景點旅遊服務提供商
ref: Go Running Tours（前身係The Global Running Tours）喺四大洲網羅咗好多觀光公司。

src: With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.
mt: 根源於巴塞隆納嘅 Running Tours Barcelona 和哥本哈根嘅 Running Copenhagen, 很快就加入了布拉格嘅 Running Tours Prague 等.
ref: 佢源於巴塞隆拿嘅 Running Tours Barcelona 同哥本哈根嘅 Running Copenhagen，好快就擴展到布拉格嘅 Running Tours Prague 同其他地方。

src: There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere.
mt: 你喺旅行之前同去旅行時,你必須考慮好多嘢
ref: 喺去某個地方旅遊之前同旅遊期間，有好多嘢都需要考慮。

src: When you travel, expect things not to be like they are "back home". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live.
mt: 當你去旅行時,你會期望事情唔會好似你"返屋企"咁.
ref: 當你旅遊嘅時候，唔使望一切都好似「返鄉下」噉。禮儀、法律、食物、交通、住宿、標準、語言等等都會喺某程度上同你住嘅地方唔同。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 禮儀、法律、食物、交通、住宿、標準、語言等等都會喺某程度上同你住嘅地方唔同。

src: This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things.
mt: 請記住呢個問題 避免失望 或者甚至唔喜歡當地人做嘢
ref: 你需要時刻記住呢一點，以免對當地嘅做事方式覺得失望，甚至反感。

src: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries.
mt: 旅行社已經存在自19世紀開始. 旅行社通常係一個好選擇, 旅行者超越過往對自然,文化,語言或者低收入國家嘅經驗.
ref: 旅行社自19世紀就已經出現。旅行社通常係一個唔錯嘅選擇，佢超越咗旅行者過往對自然、文化、語言或低收入國家嘅體驗。

src: Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations.
mt: 雖然大部分代理商都願意承擔大部分定期預訂 但好多代理商專注於特定嘅旅行類型,預算範圍或目的地
ref: 雖然大多數旅行社都肯接受大部分旅程預訂，但好多旅行社都會專門提供特定類型嘅旅遊、預算範圍或者目的地。

src: It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours.
mt: 請請一個經營者去幫你 經常預訂類似你嘅旅行
ref: 最好搵一間經常預訂同你嘅旅程類似嘅旅行社。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 經常預訂類似你嘅旅行

src: Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.
mt: 請睇下代理推廣嘅旅行 請睇下網站或者商店
ref: 睇下旅行社推廣緊嘅旅遊線路，無論係喺網站上定係喺門店櫥窗上面。

src: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that.
mt: 如果你想睇世界,用便宜嘅方式, 需要,生活方式或者挑戰,
ref: 如果你想以平靚正嘅價錢去睇世界，不論係為咗慳旅費、體驗生活方式定係挑戰，都有幾個方法可以做到。

src: Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter.
mt: 基本上,你可以將呢啲項目分成兩個類別: 工作當你出發時,或者嘗試限制你花費.
ref: 基本上可以分為兩種：一邊旅遊一邊做嘢，或者盡量限制開支。呢篇文嘅重點係後者。

src: For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel.
mt: 對於那些願意犧牲舒適,時間同可預測性 推低成本到近零嘅朋友, 請睇下最低預算旅行

mt: 卡羅琳娜州夏洛特嘅一個好處 就係佢有好多好好嘅家庭選擇

src: Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around.
mt: 其他地區居民通常認為 搬到城市嘅主要原因係親人友好
ref: 嚟自其他地區嘅居民經常將家庭友好作為搬到呢度嘅主要原因，遊客通常發現，有小朋友喺身邊好容易享受到呢座城市。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: ，遊客通常發現，有小朋友喺身邊好容易享受到呢座城市。

src: In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially.
mt: 過去20年 上市夏洛特區 兒童友好選擇數量 呈指數增長
ref: 喺過去嘅20年，夏洛特上城區裡面方便小朋友嘅選擇數量幾何級數增加。

src: Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances.
mt: 士洛特嘅家庭通常唔用出租車 雖然喺某些情況下可以有所幫助
ref: 夏洛特嘅家庭通常唔搭的士，但喺某啲情況下的士會有啲用處。

src: There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.
mt: 乘客超過 2 人需要加費 所以呢個選擇可能比必要更貴
ref: 因為超過2個乘客就要額外收費，所以呢種選擇可能會比必要嘅收費更加貴。

src: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole.
mt: 南極係地球上最冷嘅地方 圍繞著南極
ref: 南極洲係地球上最凍嘅地方，圍繞住南極。

src: Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea.
mt: 觀光客嘅遊覽成本高,需要體力,只能喺夏天11月至2月發生,而且主要限於半島,島同羅斯海.
ref: 旅遊費用高昂，需要身體健康，只能喺夏季11月至2月進行，而且主要僅限於半島、島嶼同羅斯海。

src: A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter.
mt: 幾千個工作人員喺夏天住喺四十個基地 大部分喺嗰啲地區
ref: 夏天有幾千個工作人員住喺呢度嘅40幾個基地，大部分喺呢啲地區；少數人留喺呢度過冬。

src: Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice.
mt: 內地南極係一個由2~3公里冰覆蓋嘅荒漠高原
ref: 南極洲內陸係一個畀2-3公里嘅冰層覆蓋嘅荒涼高原。

src: Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.
mt: 有時專業嘅空中旅行往內陸,登山或者去到極地
ref: 間中會有專業嘅航空旅遊團去內陸，登山或者有大型基地嘅極點。

src: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole.
mt: 南極通道 (或高速公路) 是從羅斯海上的麥克默多站到極地走 1600 公里的路徑.
ref: 南極點公路(或高速公路)係從羅斯海嘅麥克默多站到南極點嘅一條長1600公里嘅路線。

src: It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies.
mt: 佢係有條條嘅雪 只有專用拖拉機可以運送
ref: 呢度雪壓實咗，佈滿裂縫，並用旗仔標示起嚟。去嗰度只能搭專門嘅拖拉機、裝滿燃料同補給嘅雪橇。

src: These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.
mt: 呢啲唔好敏捷 所以條道需要漫長嘅道 繞過南極山脈 去到高原
ref: 佢哋唔係好靈活，所以呢條路要兜住南極橫貫山脈轉好長一段路先可以到達高原。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 漫長嘅道 繞過南極山脈

src: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps.
mt: 冬天最常見嘅事故係滑路,行人行道 (步道)
ref: 冬天最常見嘅意外都係因為濕滑嘅路面、行人路，尤其係台階。

src: At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient.
mt: 冬季鞋子通常喺冰同雪上滑得好好 甚至冬季鞋子都冇咁好
ref: 至少，你需要一對鞋底合適嘅鞋。夏天嘅鞋喺冰雪上通常好跣，甚至有啲冬天嘅靴都有缺陷。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 至少，你需要一對鞋底合適嘅鞋。
冬季鞋子通常喺冰同雪上滑得好好 甚至冬季鞋子都冇咁好

src: The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures.
mt: 圖案應該夠深, 5mm (1/5英寸) 或者更深,材料喺寒冷嘅溫度上應該夠柔軟.
ref: 坑紋要深5毫米(1/5英吋)以上，而且材料喺低溫下要夠軟熟。

src: Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole.
mt: 有啲靴有,有帶嘅附加裝置,可以用喺滑動狀態,適合大部分鞋子,鞋子,跟鞋同腳
ref: 有啲靴有飾釘，鑲咗飾釘嘅附加設備可以應付濕滑嘅情況，適用於大多數鞋同靴，專為鞋踭或鞋踭同鞋底而設。

src: Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.
mt: 腳跟應該低而寬.沙,石灰或者盐 (化) 通常喺道路或路徑上散布,以改善拖動力.
ref: 鞋踭應該又低又闊。砂石或者鹽(氯化鈣)要經常糝喺公路或者小路上，用嚟提高摩擦力。

src: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches.
mt: 雪崩唔係異常 坡只會慢慢慢停留 而剩餘嘅水量會變成雪崩
ref: 雪崩並唔係一種反常現象；陡峭嘅斜坡只可以承受咁多嘅雪，多餘嘅雪量就好似雪崩噉樣傾瀉而下。

src: The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest.
mt: 問題係雪係粘 所以需要一些引發來降落 而降落嘅雪可能會係其他事件嘅引發
ref: 問題係，雪係有黏性嘅，所以佢需要啲觸發事件先會傾瀉，而一部份嘅雪傾瀉可能會連帶觸發其他雪傾瀉落嚟。

src: Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.
mt: 有時,太陽會加熱雪 有時會降雪 有時會發生自然事件
ref: 最初嘅觸發事件有時係太陽暖雪，有時係降雪增加，有時係其他自然事件，但通常係人為嘅。

src: A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward.
mt: 風係一個旋轉嘅低壓空氣柱 吸入周圍嘅空氣
ref: 龍捲風係一個旋轉嘅極低壓氣柱，佢向內同向上吸入周圍嘅空氣。

src: They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves.
mt: 佢哋會發出強風 (經常係每小時 100 到 200 英里) 而且可以抬起重物物 運去空中
ref: 佢哋會產生強風(通常係每小時100-200英哩)，而且可以將重物拋上天同龍捲風一齊移動。

src: They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become "tornadoes" when they touch the ground.
mt: 佢哋從暴風雲中降下嘅道開始 觸摸地面之後變成"風"
ref: 佢哋一開始好似漏斗噉從風暴雲裡面下降，當佢哋觸及地面時就變成咗「龍捲風」。

src: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering.
mt: 個人 VPN (虛擬私人網絡) 提供者係一個好方法去避開政治審查同商業 IP 地理濾網
ref: 個人VPN(虛擬私人網絡)供應商係規避政治審查同商業IP地理過濾嘅絕佳方式。

src: They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http.
mt: 佢哋比網際網路代理更好 原因有幾: 佢哋會轉向所有互聯網流量,唔單止 http
ref: 佢哋比網頁代理好有幾個原因：佢哋重新路由所有互聯網流量，唔單止係http。

src: They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.
mt: 佢哋通常提供更高嘅頻寬同更高嘅服務質量 佢哋係加密嘅 所以更加難以監聽
ref: 佢哋通常提供嘅頻寬更高，服務質素更好。佢哋係加密嘅，所以好難被監視。

src: The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to "prevent piracy".
mt: 媒體公司經常講謊 宣稱呢個目的係"防止海盜行為".
ref: 媒體公司經常對噉做嘅目的講大話，口口聲聲話噉係為咗「防止盜版」。

src: In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will.
mt: 事實上,區域代碼對非法複製完全無影響 單一複製嘅磁盤喺任何原始裝置都可以播放
ref: 事實上，地區代碼對非法複製絕對冇影響；一個磁碟嘅位元對位元複製本來可以喺任何正本都可以成功播放嘅設備上順利播放。

src: The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning.
mt: 實際目的係畀呢啲公司更多嘅控制權 控制市場
ref: 佢哋實際目的係令呢啲公司對佢哋嘅市場有更多嘅控制權；呢一切都係為咗賺錢。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 更多嘅控制權 控制市場

src: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel.
mt: 因為電話係透過互聯網通訊,你唔需要用你住嘅地方或者行程嘅地方嘅電話公司
ref: 因為電話係透過網路連線嘅，你唔使用位於居住地或者旅遊地嘅電訊公司。

src: There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona.
mt: 你唔需要從你居住嘅社區獲得一個當地電話 你可以喺阿拉斯加 Chicken 野生區獲得衛星互聯網連接
ref: 亦冇要求你從你居住嘅社區獲得本地號碼；你可以喺阿拉斯加州奇金嘅野外獲得衛星網絡連接，然後揀一個號碼，聲稱你喺陽光明媚嘅亞利桑那州。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: ，然後揀一個號碼，聲稱你喺陽光明媚嘅亞利桑那州。

src: Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.
mt: 你通常要單獨買一個全球電話號碼 令PSTN電話可以打電話畀你
ref: 通常，你要單獨購買一個全球號碼，噉樣公共電話交換網嘅電話先可以打畀你。號碼嘅來源會影響打電話畀你嘅人。

src: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another.
mt: 實時文本翻譯應用程式  應用程式可以自动將整個文本段落從一個語言翻譯成另一個語言
ref: 即時文字翻譯應用程式係能夠自動將成段文字由一種語言翻譯成另一種語言嘅應用程式。

src: Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects.
mt: 部分應用程式甚至可以將文字翻譯成外語 實際世界上出現嘅標誌或者其他物件

src: The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong.
mt: 翻譯機有著劇烈嘅改善 已經有時會提供更少或更正確嘅翻譯 (而且更少會講過) 但需要注意 因為佢哋可能仍然明白錯
ref: 翻譯引擎已經得到咗大幅改良，而家經常畀得出或多或少正確嘅翻譯(而且好少文理不通)，但仲係要小心，因為佢哋依然可能會完全翻譯錯。

src: One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.
mt: 呢類最突出嘅應用程式之一係 Google Translate, 隨著下載所需語言數據, 提供無線翻譯.
ref: 喺呢類應用程式裡面，其中一個最突出嘅係Google翻譯，佢可以喺下載所需嘅語言數據之後進行離線翻譯。

src: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country.
mt: 用手機上 GPS 导航應用程式 可以係你離開你本國時 最簡單,最方便嘅方法
ref: 喺外國用智能手機上嘅GPS導航應用程式係最簡單、最方便嘅導航方式。

src: It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company.
mt: 可以省錢買新地圖 GPS 或者獨立 GPS 裝置 或者租車公司

src: If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.
mt: 如果你冇手機嘅數據連接 或者佢冇用 性能可能有限或者冇用
ref: 如果你部手機冇數據連線，或者超出範圍，佢哋嘅功能就可能會受到限制或者用唔到。

src: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones.
mt: 每個角落嘅商店都滿足咗好多預付電話卡 可以從平手電話或者平手電話中使用
ref: 每個街角嘅店鋪都擺滿咗一排排令人眼花繚亂嘅預繳電話卡，呢啲卡既可以用於付費電話，又可以用於普通電話。

src: While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries.

ref: 雖然大多數電話卡都可以接通任何地方，但有啲電話卡專門為特定國家群組提供優惠嘅通話收費。

src: Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.
mt: 接觸呢啲服務通常係用無收費電話號碼
ref: 使用呢啲服務通常係通過免費電話號碼獲得嘅，大多數電話都可以免費撥打。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 獲得嘅，大多數電話都可以免費撥打。

src: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so.
mt: 規則有關定期攝影 適用於錄影視頻
ref: 一般攝影嘅規則都可以應用喺拍攝影片上，而且拍攝影片嘅規則可能更多。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 上，而且拍攝影片嘅規則可能更多。

src: If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it.

ref: 如果有嘢唔准影相，咁你都唔可以拍片。

src: If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required.
mt: 如果你用無人機, 提前要好好先查看你有咩可以影影影 同埋需要咩許可證或者其他授權
ref: 如果要用航拍無人機嘅話，要事前檢查清楚可以影咩，有冇需要申請許可證或其他牌照。

src: Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.
mt: 飛機喺機場附近或者喺人群上面 都幾乎係錯嘅諗法 即使喺你所在嘅地區
ref: 即使喺你所在地唔違法，喺機場附近或者人群上空飛無人機幾乎都係一個壞主意。

src: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices.

src: Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

ref: 有時候，同一航班喺唔同資訊彙集網站上嘅價格可能相差好大，喺預訂前比較搜尋結果同查詢航空公司網站係值得嘅。

src: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist.
mt: 雖然你唔需要簽證去某些國家做旅遊者或者做生意 但當你去國外留學時,你通常需要留住更長時間
ref: 雖然以遊客或者商務人士身份短期到訪某啲國家可能唔使辦簽證，不過以國際學生身份去嗰度通常需要比以普通遊客身份逗留更長嘅時間。

src: In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance.
mt: 一般來說,如果你喺任何一個外國居住長時間,你需要提前取得簽證.

src: Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas.

src: For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course.

src: Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in.

src: Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another.

src: In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle.

src: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving.

src: Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills.

src: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get.

src: The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes.
mt: 白海波爾蒂克運河 通過奧內加湖,拉多加湖同聖彼得堡 聯繫北極海同波爾蒂克海,主要由河流和湖泊.

src: Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you.

src: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam.

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 佢嘅物業價值喺全國名列前茅。

src: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria.
mt: Cinque Terre,意思係五個土地,包括五個小嘅海岸村落 Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza 和 Monterosso 位于意大利利古利亞地區.

src: They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List.

src: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.

src: Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.

src: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible.
mt: 比利時同瑞士講法文嘅種類 略有不同於法國講法文,雖然佢哋相似到可以互相理解
ref: 比利時同瑞士講嘅法文同法國講嘅法文有少少唔同，但佢哋好相似，足以相互理解。

src: In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different.

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: ，而某啲字詞嘅發音亦有少少唔同。

src: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
mt: 但係所有講法嘅比利時同瑞士人 都喺學校學過標準法文 所以即使你用標準法文編號系統
ref: 雖然咁講，但所有講法文嘅比利時同瑞士人喺學校都學過標準法文，所以佢哋都能夠理解標準法文嘅數字系統。

src: In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating "hello."
mt: 美國嘅"世界"
ref: 喺世界好多地方，揮手係一種友好嘅手勢，表示「你好」。

src: However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means "come over," similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose.

ref: 不過，喺馬來西亞，至少喺農村地區嘅馬來人當中，佢係指「過嚟」，類似於向身體方向屈食指，呢種手勢喺某啲西方國家使用，兼且只可以用於呢種目的。

src: Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back.
mt: 同樣,一個英國人去西班牙旅行時,可能會認為 打別人一聲 打手指向人 (而唔係打手指向人) 係回來嘅動作
ref: 同樣，喺西班牙嘅英國遊客可能會將手掌面向揮手者（而唔係對住揮手對象）嘅揮手告別誤以為係返嚟嘅手勢。

src: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating.
mt: 輔助語言係人工語言或者係用於促進溝通 其他語言會有難溝通嘅人之間嘅溝通
ref: 輔助語言係人工語言或人造語言，創造嘅目的係促進原本喺其他方面溝通困難嘅人士之間嘅交流。

src: They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.
mt: 佢哋與 lingua francas 分離,係自然語言或者有機語言,因為某個原因,成為其他語言話者之間溝通嘅主流語言.
ref: 佢哋同通用語係分開嘅，通用語係一種自然語言或有機性語言，出於某種原因成為其他語言使用者之間嘅主要溝通方式。

src: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things).
mt: 炎熱嘅日光,旅行者可以見到幻象 令人覺得好似水 (或者其他嘢)
ref: 喺日頭最熱嘅時候，旅客可以體驗到海市蜃樓嘅錯覺，好似會出現水（或其他嘢）嘅幻象咁。

src: These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water.
mt: 旅行者如果追尋神奇世界,浪費珍貴嘅能量同剩下的水,
ref: 如果旅客去追海市蜃樓，浪費寶貴嘅能量同剩低嘅水，噉樣可能係好危險嘅。

src: Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.
mt: 即使係最熱嘅沙漠 都可以喺夜晚變得非常冷
ref: 就算係最熱嘅沙漠喺夜晚都會變得極之凍。因為保暖衣物不足而導致低溫症會非常危險。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 因為保暖衣物不足而導致低溫症會非常危險。

src: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest.
mt: 尤其喺夏天,如果你決定穿過雨林行走, 你需要小心蚊子
ref: 尤其係喺夏天，如果你決定徒步穿越雨林，你要小心啲蚊。

src: Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.
mt: 即使你喺熱帶雨林中行駛 但喺你入車時 門開咗幾秒 就足夠時間畀蚊子同你入車
ref: 就算你揸緊車穿越亞熱帶雨林，你打開門上車嗰幾秒鐘，就足夠啲蚊同你一齊上車喇。

src: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals.
mt: 鳥インフルエンザ 或者鳥インフルエンザ 可以感染鳥類同哺乳類
ref: 禽流感，或者更正式噉叫禽流行性感冒，可以感染鳥類同哺乳類動物。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 鳥インフルエンザ 或者鳥インフルエンザ

src: Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal.
mt: 冇過一千個病例 報告過喺人類身上 但其中一啲病例係致命嘅
ref: 據報導，人類感染禽流感嘅病例唔到一千宗，但其中一啲係致命病例。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 一千個病例 報告過喺人類身上

src: Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.
mt: 大多數係用家做禽 但對鳥類觀察者嚟講都有危險
ref: 雖然大多數都喺同家禽打交道嘅人，但對觀鳥者嚟講都有啲風險。

src: Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau.
mt: 挪威嘅典型係嘅峡谷同谷口 突然間變成高原
ref: 挪威嘅典型特徵係，陡峭嘅峽灣同山谷突然出現又高幾乎又平坦嘅高原。

src: These plateaus are often referred to as "vidde" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse.
mt: 呢啲高原通常被稱為"vidde" 意思係一個寬,無樹木嘅空間
ref: 呢啲高原通常會被稱為「vidde」，意思係一個廣闊開放、冇樹木同無邊無際嘅空間。

src: In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called "hei" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather.
mt: 喺羅格蘭德同阿格德,佢哋通常叫做"海" 意思係無樹木嘅沼地
ref: 喺羅加蘭郡同阿格德，佢哋通常叫做「hei」，意思係一片冇樹木、通常覆蓋住石南花嘅荒原。

src: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges.
mt: 冰川唔穩定 但會流落山地 令到冰川有裂痕 雪橋可能會遮住
ref: 冰川並唔穩定，但從山上流落嚟。噉會導致裂開，形成裂縫，佢哋可能會被雪橋遮住。

src: The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed.
mt: 冰洞嘅牆同屋頂可能崩塌 裂痕可能被封鎖
ref: 冰洞嘅洞壁同洞頂可能會倒塌，裂縫可能會閉合。

src: At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.
mt: 喺冰川邊邊 巨大的積木會脫落 或者跳落或者滑落
ref: 喺冰川邊緣，巨大嘅冰塊突然變得鬆動、墜落，可能會從邊緣跳動或者再轆遠啲。

src: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer.
mt: 印度夏季,山地站嘅旅遊季度通常係最高峰
ref: 山中度假勝地嘅旅遊旺季高峰通常喺印度夏天。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 旅遊季度通常係最高峰

src: However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
mt: 但係冬季,佢哋有唔同嘅美麗同魅力 很多山地都得到好多雪 而且有滑雪同滑雪等活動
ref: 不過，喺冬天，佢哋有住另一番嘅美態同魅力，好多山中度假勝地積咗大量嘅雪，並提供滑雪、單板滑雪等活動。

src: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel.
mt: 只有幾家航空公司仍然提供喪禮費 低咗最後一次葬禮嘅費用
ref: 只有少數航空公司仲會提供喪親票價，呢個價略低於最後一刻奔喪費票價。

src: Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet.
mt: 提供呢啲航空公司包括加拿大航空,德拉航空公司,加拿大航空公司,以及西捷航空公司
ref: 提供呢啲服務嘅航空公司包括加拿大航空、達美航空、漢莎航空（針對美國或加拿大起飛嘅航班）同西捷航空。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: （針對美國或加拿大起飛嘅航班）

src: In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.
mt: 任何情況下,你必須直接電話到航空公司訂房
ref: 喺任何情況下，你必須直接打電話畀航空公司預訂。

src: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.
mt: 佢話:"我哋宜家有四個月嘅老鼠 冇糖尿病 以前係糖尿病嘅"
ref: 佢補充話：「我哋而家有 4 個月大嘅小鼠，佢哋而家冇糖尿病，但曾經有過糖尿病。」

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.
mt: 艾胡德·乌爾博士 喺新蘇科西亞哈利法克斯嘅達爾豪西大學嘅醫學教授 同加拿大糖尿病協會嘅臨床科學部門主席
ref: 新斯科舍省哈利法克斯嘅達爾豪西大學醫學教授兼加拿大糖尿病協會臨床與科學部門主席艾胡德·烏爾醫生警告，呢項研究仲處於早期階段。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 呢項研究仲處於早期階段

src: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
mt: 佢好似其他專家一樣,懷疑糖尿病是否可以醫好 佢指出呢啲發現對已經患有型號糖尿病嘅人無關
ref: 同其他專家一樣，佢對於係咪可以醫好糖尿病抱有懷疑態度，而且指出呢項發現同1型糖尿病病人冇關。

src: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
mt: 星期一,瑞典學院諾貝爾文学委員會常任書記 Sara Danius 喺瑞典斯威爾維基電台發表嘅電視節目中公佈,
ref: 喺星期一，瑞典學院諾貝爾文學獎委員會常任秘書薩拉·丹尼烏斯喺瑞典廣播電台嘅一個廣播節目入面公佈，委員會因為冇辦法直接聯絡鮑勃·迪倫，通知佢獲得 2016 年諾貝爾文學獎呢件事，惟有放棄聯繫佢。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 委員會因為冇辦法直接聯絡鮑勃·迪倫，通知佢獲得 2016 年諾貝爾文學獎呢件事，惟有放棄聯繫佢

src: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."
mt: Danius話:"目前我哋無做嘢 我已經打電話畀佢最親密嘅合作者,
ref: 丹尼烏斯話：「而家我哋唔採取任何行動。我已經打咗電話同發電郵畀佢最緊密嘅拍檔，而且得到非常友善嘅回覆。就而家嚟講，噉樣就足夠喇。」

src: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.
mt: 以前,環球公司首席執行官 Jamie Siminoff 指出公司開始於佢車庫嘅店頭
ref: 此前，鈴聲 (Ring) 公司嘅CEO占美·西米諾夫表示，公司創辦嘅原因係當時佢間汽車修理廠嘅車間門鐘唔響。

src: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.
mt: 佢話佢整咗個WiFi門鐘
ref: 佢話，佢製造咗個WiFi門鐘。

src: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.
mt: Siminoff話,佢喺 2013 年喺 Shark Tank 集中出現之後,銷售增長
ref: 西米諾夫話，2013 年佢喺《創智赢家》節目入面露面之後，公司嘅銷售額大增，當時嘅節目組拒絕向呢間初創公司投資。

mt: Ring 同其他安全公司ADT公司仲裁起诉

src: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.
mt: 雖然有一個試用疫苗可以減少埃博拉死亡率 但到目前為止 冇藥物可以治療現有感染
ref: 雖然有一款實驗性疫苗似乎可以降低伊波拉嘅死亡率，但係目前為止，仲未明確顯示有任何一款藥物係適合治療而家嘅感染。

src: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.
mt: 一種抗體尾酒叫做ZMapp 起初喺呢個領域有望出現 但正式研究表明 佢對防止死亡嘅好處比預期嘅好處少
ref: 一種名為 ZMapp 嘅「抗體雞尾酒」最初有望喺呢個領域發揮作用，但正式研究顯示，佢喺預防死亡方面嘅效果有啲唔太理想。

src: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.
mt: 喺 PALM 實驗中,ZMapp 成為一種控制方法, 科學家用佢做一個基線, 同其他三種治療比較.
ref: 喺 PALM 試驗入面，ZMapp 作為對照組，亦即係科學家將佢作為基線，而且將另外三種治療方法同佢進行對比。

src: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.
mt: 美國體操支持美國奧運委員會嘅信 接受奧運家庭 絕對需要 促進所有運動員嘅安全環境
ref: 美國體操協會支持美國奧委會嘅信函，同時承認奧林匹克家族有必要為所有運動員創造安全嘅環境。

src: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.
mt: 我哋同意美國運動會嘅聲明 運動員同俱樂部嘅利益 同埋佢哋運動 應該通過組織內有意義嘅改變 而唔係退牌
ref: 我哋同意美國奧委會嘅聲明，與其取消認證，倒不如喺我哋組織內部繼續推進有意義嘅變革，可能更有利於維護我哋運動員同俱樂部嘅利益以及佢哋嘅體育運動項目。

可能更有利於維護我哋

src: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.
mt: 美國體操支持一個獨立嘅調查 能夠揭示 拉里·納薩嘅幸存者勇敢咁描述嘅比例嘅濫用 點樣長時間未被發現
ref: 美國體操協會支持獨立調查，呢項調查可能會揭露拉利·纳沙嘅倖存者幾咁勇敢講述有幾大比例嘅虐待長期都未畀人發現，協會亦歡迎任何必要和適當嘅改變。

annotatedSpans.error_text_segment: 協會亦歡迎任何必要和適當嘅改變

src: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.
mt: 美國體操同美國體操協會都有同樣嘅目標  確保體操和其他運動員可以喺安全,積極,有權力嘅環境下追求佢哋嘅夢想
ref: 美國體操協會同美國奧委會有一個共同嘅目標──儘可能保證體操運動同其他運動嘅安全性，令到運動員喺安全、積極同充滿支持嘅環境之中追尋夢想。

src: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
mt: 喺 1960 年代,布雷茲辛斯基為約翰·肯尼迪做咗顧問,然後為林登·B.約翰遜政府工作

src: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976年選舉期間,佢就外交政策顧問卡特,然後從 1977 年到 1981 年擔任國家安全顧問 (NSA),接續亨利·基辛格.

src: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment.
mt: 2010 年地震之後 嚟到海地嘅聯合國和平部隊 被指責喺軍隊營附近開始蔓延嘅疾病
ref: 2010 年地震之後抵達海地嘅聯合國維和部隊畀人指責係呢個病蔓延嘅罪魁禍首，呢個病就係喺部隊嘅營地附近開始傳染嘅。

src: According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest.

src: Around 3 minutes into the launch, an on-board camera showed numerous pieces of insulation foam break away from the fuel tank.

src: Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other.
mt: 五分鐘後,風開始滾入, 大概一分鐘後,風速達到70公里/小時... 然後雨就會降落, 但好強大,好大,
ref: 展示前五分鐘開始翻起大風，大概一分鐘後，風速達到時速七十公哩……然之後就落起咗大雨，雨滴大到好似針噉拍打你嘅皮膚，跟著冰雹從天而降，大家驚到尖叫，互相推撞。

src: I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them," Armand Versace said.
mt: 我失去咗我妹妹同佢個朋友 我路上有兩個殘疾人坐輪椅 人跳過嚟推佢哋"
ref: 我同我嘅家姐、佢嘅朋友失散咗，路上有兩個坐輪椅嘅殘疾人士，啲人只不過跨過去同推撞佢哋，」阿爾芒·范思哲講。

src: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally.
mt: NHK亦報導尼加塔縣卡西瓦薩基卡里瓦核電廠正常運作

src: Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down.

ref: 北陸電力公司報告話，地震冇造成任何影響，佢哋嘅志賀核能發電廠嘅1號同2號反應堆已經關閉。

src: It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity.

src: Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.
mt: 有啲道路受損 影響地區鐵路運營停電 伊西卡瓦縣諾托機場仍然封鎖
ref: 部份道路受損，受影響地區嘅鐵路服務亦中斷，而石川縣嘅能登機場依然關閉。

src: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office.
mt: 一個炸彈喺總督府外爆炸
ref: 一個炸彈喺州長辦公室外面爆炸。

src: Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours.

ref: 喺兩個鐘之內，另外三個炸彈喺政府大樓附近爆炸。

src: Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.
